sections.Known Castellans:
* Ser {[[Rodrik Cassel]]}, Castellan of Winterfell in the absence of [[Robb Stark]]. Executed by [[Theon Greyjoy]].
* [[Ramsay Snow]], Castellan of [[the Dreadfort]] in the absence of his father Lord [[Roose Bolton]].
* Ser [[Gregor Clegane]], called "the Mountain That Rides", Castellan of [[Harrenhal]] in the absence of Lord [[Tywin Lannister]]. Abandoned the castle.
* {[[Locke]]}, Castellan of [[Harrenhal]] in the absence of Lord Bolton.
* [[Duncan Tuttle]], Castellan of [[Ironrath]] in the absence of Lord [[Gregor Forrester]]. Â
sections.TOP: Castellan0206238mj7b7a9rc1w6wpl3lga0dssudafgxi1671962014-12-07T12:49:54ZThe Snow Prince24099677'''Castellan''' is a position granted by a lord to a member of his household. It confers responsibility for the defense and governance of a castle or territory in the absence of the lord or if the lord is too young.
